body.p: An entity shall disclose the gain or loss, if any, calculated in accordance with paragraph 25 of IFRS 10, and:

li.p: the portion of that gain or loss attributable to measuring any investment retained in the former subsidiary at its fair value at the date when control is lost; and
the line item(s) in profit or loss in which the gain or loss is recognised (if not presented separately).
